scenario_text.value:
Hurry, over here! Don’t worry about Jijimon!
He’s inside!

Get yourself out of here! It’d be stupid to
die in a place like this!
Saki, we’re finished clearing out this side!

I’m pretty much done over here! The professor
is looking after the injured ones!

Me and Falcomon’ll make sure no bad guys come
their way!
Right! Please do that, Minoru!

This has gone off without a hitch thanks to
your precise instructions, Aoi.

I’d expect nothing less! Thanks so much for
coming to help!
(Uh, I don’t deserve praise like that...)
Oh no, the fog’s come in!
Look, it’s swallowing everything up!

But we haven’t been able to clear everyone
out yet...!

(What should we do? It’s too risky to push
any further.)
Saki, we’ve done all we can.
What’re you saying?! We still haven’t—

If we try to rescue them now, we could get
caught up in the fog too!

If we die here, just think of what that would
do to Takuma and the others...

You’re right. It’ll be that much harder to
save Miyuki if there’s fewer of us to help.

...But I haven’t done everything I can yet.
I don’t want any regrets!

I’ve seen so many people get hurt since we
came here...

Each and every time I think about how I never
want to see something like that again!

If I give up now, I couldn’t go on! I can’t
face my surgery feeling like this!
Saki...

That’s why I’m going! I’ll save them all!
You head to where Minoru is, Aoi!
What?

Don’t forget, you’re our all-important mother
hen, Aoi.

If anything happened to you, the rest of us
would be lost, you know?

(Saki... She wants to save everyone, even if
it costs her everything...)
(And yet, all I’ve ever done is run away!)

I can’t just leave you alone, Saki.
Besides...

Two heads are better than one, right?
I’ll help you.
Me too! Aoi and me are always together!

We’ll save everyone, together!
That’s the only choice!

Thanks, guys! And Aoi, thanks for always
being so sweet.

(You’re always saying that, Saki, but...
you’re the kindest one of us all.)

(I can’t do what I want if it means breaking
the rules we all decided on together.)

Over here! Don’t worry, we won’t leave a
single one of you behind!

(I only think of the results. I’m never
prepared to take responsibility...)
(...Can I become like you someday?)

(Truly kind, and willing to take
responsibility for my actions...)

Looks like everyone’s cleared out of here!
Okay, next!
Hey, Saki...
What is it? You sound so meek...
I...want to become like you.

Um, come again? I can’t say I really get you,
but...

That...might be the nicest thing anyone’s
ever said to me.

I mean, I’ve always...wanted to be someone
like you...

No. Nuh-uh. Now’s not the time to get all
deep and stuff! Ahaha!

Yeah, you’re right.
Okay, let’s save everyone!
Yeah! I don’t sense anyone else around here!
Looks like things are okay now, Saki.

Okay! Then it’s our turn to get out of here!
...Visibility’s getting pretty bad, though.
We can still see. Let’s escape while we can!
HELP...ME...
Did you hear a voice just now...?
HELP...ME...

I definitely heard it that time.
Someone needs our help!
Aoi! Where are you going?!

It’s okay... It sounds like one of the little
ones. I’ll rescue you, hold tight!

(If I leave anyone behind now...
I’ll never be like Saki.)

It’s okay, don’t be scared.
Come here, I’m here to save you.
Wait, Aoi, don’t! That’s—!
HELP...MEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!
Wait, is this...a trick?!
Stay away from Aoi!!!
Gaaaugh...!
Saki! Don’t do anything crazy!

That’s not enough to faze me! More
importantly, can you stand, Aoi?!

Yes, I’m okay! But this situation looks
pretty grim...

Stand back, Aoi. When the chips are down,
I’ll protect all of you!
Heeey! You guys okay?!
Kaito! And Takuma, too! You came for us?

You know it! Everything’s cool now that
Takuma and Kaito are on the case!

What’s the sitch?! Tell us what’s happening
here!
We just helped all those little guys escape!

That means we just gotta knock out that nasty
guy here and the others hiding in the fog!
So long story short, leave this part to us!
Takuma, we have to fight too!
Yeah, of course!

I’ll stay here and provide support! Saki,
Miu, you guys meet up with Minoru!
What?! But I wanna fight, too!

You’re the queen of this place, right, Miu?!
You know what your main priority is!
Protecting...everyone!

Right!
Let’s go lead everyone to a safer place!

Aoi... Takuma, Kaito... I’m counting on you
guys!
Okay! We’ll definitely stop them here!
You got it!
Let’s do this!
Thanks! C’mon, Miu, let’s go!
